titleStmt.title: The articles of lete and courte for the lyberties of Southwarke
titleStmt.author: Southwark (London, England)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ihon Cawood, prynter to the Quenes Maiestie. Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis,

notesStmt.note: Probably issued with with "The charge of the Court Baron" [of Southwark], 1561--STC.
Imperfect; trimmed at head, affecting running title.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
